title: Welcome, Coach Thiago Motta! - Juventus
snippet: Welcome, Coach Thiago Motta! Juventus Football Club is delighted to announce Thiago Motta as the new First Team head coach.

title: Thiago Motta - Wikipedia
snippet: On 12 June 2024, Motta was appointed as head coach of Serie A club Juventus, signing a three-year contract.

title: Juventus Parts Ways with Thiago Motta and Announces New Head Coach | beIN SPORTS
snippet: Juventus has officially parted ways with Thiago Motta as head coach and announced the appointment of Croatian manager Igor Tudor, who will take over from this Sunday until the end of the season.

title: Thiago Motta appointed new Juventus head coach after Massimiliano Allegri’s departure - The Athletic
snippet: Thiago Motta has been appointed Juventus head coach on a three-year contract through to 2027. The 41-year-old replaces former manager Massimiliano Allegri, who was sacked in May despite winning the Coppa Italia.

title: Thiago Motta no longer First Team coach, Igor Tudor takes over - Juventus
